translations: n．情人，恋人（复数）：指与某人有浪漫关系的女性。
· He had several inamoratas during his college years.
在他大学时期，他有过几位情人。

sentences.sentence: Money has the ability to unite more inamoratas. More money could unite all the poor inamoratas over the world.
sentences.translation: 有钱可以团结更多二奶，有更多的钱，就让天下的穷苦的二奶们都团结起来。
